short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert copied content to markdown format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy and paste the text format from the web page into the markdown file

A Chrome extension that allows users to copy selected text and automatically convert it into well-formatted Markdown.

ðŸ›  Usage
  1. Highlight the text you want to copy.
  2. Click the Transform icon button that appears below the copied text.
